description: Tango Football Club is a professional football club dedicated to excellence on and off the pitch. Founded in 1995, we have grown to become one of the most competitive teams in the league.

clubPhilosophy.title: Our Philosophy
clubPhilosophy.description: At Tango FC, we believe in developing not just skilled footballers, but well-rounded individuals who contribute positively to our community. Our three pillars guide everything we do:

pillars.name: Excellence
pillars.description: Striving for perfection in every aspect of our game and organization

pillars.name: Community
pillars.description: Giving back to Masvingo through youth development and community programs

pillars.name: Integrity
pillars.description: Conducting ourselves with honesty, respect, and sportsmanship both on and off the pitch

achievements.title: MOSSL Champions
achievements.description: Won the Masvingo Social Soccer League with outstanding performance: 27 wins, 6 draws, 3 losses from 38 matches (86 points)

achievements.title: League Champions
achievements.description: Won the Premier League with 89 points

achievements.title: Youth Academy Excellence
achievements.description: 5 youth players promoted to first team

milestones: 1995 - Club Founded by Sports Community Initiative
2025/26 - MOSSL Champions with unbeaten run in final 12 matches
